faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common queries about our Night Mode Enhancement

items.title: How does the night mode enhancement work?
items.description: Our AI analyzes your low-light images and applies advanced algorithms to boost brightness, improve color accuracy, and reduce noise, giving your photos a professional touch.

items.title: Is this AI night enhancement feature free?
items.description: Yes! Each user has access to 30 free credits daily, perfect for enhancing multiple images. Additional credits can be earned through user engagement and challenges.

items.title: Can I use the enhanced images commercially?
items.description: Paid users with any subscription can utilize their enhanced images for commercial purposes. Free-tier users can use them for personal use only.

items.title: What about my privacy and image security?
items.description: Images are processed entirely within your browser, ensuring they are never uploaded or stored on our servers, safeguarding your privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Transform Your Night Photos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI Night Mode Enhancement now and elevate your photography without any hassle. No sign-up required.
